[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@firebase/analytics](./analytics.md) &gt; [GtagConfigParams](./analytics.gtagconfigparams.md)

## GtagConfigParams interface

A set of common Analytics config settings recognized by gtag.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface GtagConfigParams 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  ["allow\_google\_signals?"](./analytics.gtagconfigparams._allow_google_signals__.md) | boolean | If set to false, disables all advertising features with gtag.js. See [Disable advertising features](https://developers.google.com/analytics/devguides/collection/ga4/display-features) |
|  [allow\_ad\_personalization\_signals?](./analytics.gtagconfigparams.allow_ad_personalization_signals.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> If set to false, disables all advertising personalization with gtag.js. See [Disable advertising features](https://developers.google.com/analytics/devguides/collection/ga4/display-features) |
|  [cookie\_domain?](./analytics.gtagconfigparams.cookie_domain.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Defaults to <code>auto</code>. See [Cookies and user identification](https://developers.google.com/analytics/devguides/collection/ga4/cookies-user-id) |
|  [cookie\_expires?](./analytics.gtagconfigparams.cookie_expires.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Defaults to 63072000 (two years, in seconds). See [Cookies and user identification](https://developers.google.com/analytics/devguides/collection/ga4/cookies-user-id) |
|  [cookie\_flags?](./analytics.gtagconfigparams.cookie_flags.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Appends additional flags to the cookie when set. See [Cookies and user identification](https://developers.google.com/analytics/devguides/collection/ga4/cookies-user-id) |
|  [cookie\_prefix?](./analytics.gtagconfigparams.cookie_prefix.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Defaults to <code>_ga</code>. See [Cookies and user identification](https://developers.google.com/analytics/devguides/collection/ga4/cookies-user-id) |
|  [cookie\_update?](./analytics.gtagconfigparams.cookie_update.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> If set to true, will update cookies on each page load. Defaults to true. See [Cookies and user identification](https://developers.google.com/analytics/devguides/collection/ga4/cookies-user-id) |
|  [page\_location?](./analytics.gtagconfigparams.page_location.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The URL of the page. See [Page views](https://developers.google.com/analytics/devguides/collection/ga4/page-view) |
|  [page\_title?](./analytics.gtagconfigparams.page_title.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The title of the page. See [Page views](https://developers.google.com/analytics/devguides/collection/ga4/page-view) |
|  [send\_page\_view?](./analytics.gtagconfigparams.send_page_view.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Whether or not a page view should be sent. If set to true (default), a page view is automatically sent upon initialization of analytics. See [Page views](https://developers.google.com/analytics/devguides/collection/ga4/page-view) |
